extendedInfo.description: âââ FEATURED BY APPLE IN 151 COUNTRIES âââGoop Escape is ONE OF THE BEST BRAIN PUZZLE GAMES ever. This beautiful game will make your brain tick and push the limits of your puzzle solving skills. It looks simple and is easy to play but becomes very challenging and addictive. Help miserable goops find their way to the exit gates. Goops can only be moved in 4 directions by rolling them. Once moved, goops cannot stop until they hit a wall or another goop. Plan your moves and position goops strategically to find their exits. Use teleporters to transfer goops to a different position. Avoid deadly black holes and spikes. This game will increase your spatial reasoning, analytical thinking and creativity. There are multiple solutions to most levels. Earn more stars by solving puzzles making less moves. The less moves you make and the faster you solve, the higher you score. If you are not satisfied with your score, play again and score higher to get into top rankings in the leaderboard. Got stuck? Use hints to view the steps that will guide you to a solution. KEY FEATURES: â 84 hand crafted levels, and more levels coming soon â 7 different stages (checker, wood, moon, street, desert, leather, ice hockey) â NO ADs â Beautiful music and sound effects â Wonderful graphics â Funny animations â Easy on the eyes, optimized graphics for all screen sizes â Global leaderboards â Hints and unlimited 'undo's provided to help you solve puzzles Like us on facebook.com/goopescape and earn 2 hints. Follow us on twitter.com/goopescape for news and hints.*We do not collect or access any personal information about users

reviews.title: Challenging
reviews.comment: Provides an easy outlet for us to put our brains into good use. UI is very easy to understand and GI doesn\'t lag. Good work Devs!
reviews.author: Luna Temple

reviews.title: pretty good
reviews.comment: It is a pretty good game, but it has too few hints. It\'s really hard to complete some level s though.@
reviews.author: Natalie Hoang

reviews.title: Good one
reviews.comment: Its really intresting, and need patience... Some of the stages takes more than 3-4hrs or just 5mins.. It teaches how to use optimize available resources
reviews.author: subodh wasankar

reviews.title: Brain hurts!
reviews.comment: What a fun game! A lot more challenging than I was expecting. Refreshing, great new puzzle game to add to my collection! Hours of mind numbing fun! At least try for free and see for yourself if you like a good puzzler :-)
reviews.author: ryan brault

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Its nice to pass the time
reviews.author: may rowe

reviews.title: Goop Escape
reviews.comment: You have to think about what moves to make and watch the timer, you will run out of time just when you have all most figured it out, but don\'t worry you can go back and try it again.
reviews.author: Jennie Dominick

reviews.title: The shiznit
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this game. The Goop\'s are adorable and the game is fun and challenging. Awesome work on this one. Just have a problem with the Facebook sharing application not working. Will most deffinately look for other games by this developer. Thanks for making this disabled gal smile. PROUDGUARDMOM
reviews.author: Dana Stanley

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: Simple to get started but highy addictive!
reviews.author: Rob Fogarty

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: Early in the game yet, rated for a free hint, lol. But I do like it - makes you work the gray matter!
reviews.author: Adrienne Meyers

reviews.title: GREAT
reviews.comment: A great game for those (like me) that enjoy QUELL, KUNUNDRUM, CRYPTICA, PUSH THE BOX.  The only reasons that it didn\'t get 5 stars is because the graphics are a little bland and ordinary & because it kept nagging me for a \"review\" (in exchange for a free hint)...before I could get a good feel for the game.  Other than that, it\'s awesome...ESP. since it\'s free!

reviews.title: so far so good.
reviews.comment: Its challenging which is good.
